Base_Exploration_Strategy module¶

class Base_Exploration_Strategy.Base_Exploration_Strategy(config)¶

Bases: object

Base abstract class for agent exploration strategies. Every exploration strategy must inherit from this class and implement the methods perturb_action_for_exploration_purposes and add_exploration_rewards

perturb_action_for_exploration_purposes(action_info)¶

Perturbs the action of the agent to encourage exploration

add_exploration_rewards(reward_info)¶

Actions intrinsic rewards to encourage exploration

reset()¶

Resets the noise process
